name: Mating Call
description:
In Mating Call you will challenge your friends in a mating ritual to conquer the female.
She will performs various calls and you have to be faster (or slower) than your opponents at recognizing them and react accordingly.
May the best animal win.

Prototype created during  Global Game Jam 2016.
Original page: https://globalgamejam.org/2016/games/mating-call

Credits

  • Art and Animation:
    • Giulia Hulme
    • Gilbey Ibarra
    • Gabriele Falzone
  • Programming:
    • Fabio Marocchi
    • Riccardo Amico
  • Sound Design:
    • Giorgio Vezzini

Gamepads required.
